name: eclore
short_description:
The aim is to able to execute orders given in french or in english. It means the entry respect spelling rules, grammary rules, the word are in the official dictionnary, the meaning of the word is respected.

  To do that, the library provides the objects to build easily a stack of comunication. It also encapsulate several libraries, to be able to execute the wanted actions.

   Now the project is just a proof of concept. The software is able to understand several sentences in english or in french, there is still a lot work to do be used.
